## About


<font size='4'>
I am an graduate student at the University of Alaska Fairbanks studying applied mathematics. 
I also work as a graduate researcher in the Museum of the North Herbarium laboratory, apply 
machine learning and computer vision to species delineation on herbarium sheet samples. 

My research interests include numerical analysis, machine learning, and graph theory.
</font>
